name: Arnav Saxena
title: Michael Page | Deloitte | IIT Kharagpur
summary:
Passionate builder wearing two hats : 
1. Expertise in director search, board advisory, CXO search and selection for the world's top companies
2. Engineering distributed systems, algo trading platforms, conversational AI, natural language processing systems

I am currently looking after the board practice for Michael Page in Mumbai. I have taken up executive search assignments across global organisations to appoint at Board, C-Suite, and Senior Management level. 

Public Speaking Engagements
•     UN centre for agriculture & mountain development (ICIMOD Kathmandu)
•     National conference on sustainable inclusive growth through socially responsible enterprise, Mumbai
•     Seminar on Innovations, Govt. of Rajasthan
•     Cropworld India
•     InfluencerCon

Awards : 
•     Village Capital 
•     Sankalp Forum 
•     Global Social Venture Challenge,  Berkeley - Haas
•     UnLtd India
•     Awards @IIMC, @IIMI, @IITKGP, @IIMA

member_experience_collection.title: Salesman
member_experience_collection.description:
Zemaia works with small and medium sized businesses to generate more leads and close more sales out of their website traffic.

If you have visitors leaving your website without enquiring, or if your existing contact us form delivers leads in your mailbox, you might find it difficult to follow up and distribute leads within your team, often missing and getting delayed in calling up potential clients losing out on precious sales. Use our app and connect it to your website. Just like Uber, Your team will get a notification whenever a lead is raised and the first available salesperson can claim it and dial or email or SMS the client directly from the app. You will witness an instant 5% increase in website visitor to lead conversion rate and a lead to cash conversion by more than 3 times. Send in your details and we will show you a quick 10 minute demo on how it works.

Activities
- Sales : B2B sales, lead generation by cold calling, digital marketing - inbound and outbound
- Lead a team to code and design the backend and app for iOS and android stores in 2 months!

Website : www.zemaia.com
Email : arnav@zemaia.com

member_experience_collection.title: Founder & CEO
member_experience_collection.description:
Activities
- Led a team of 8 people to build a catalog based virtual store for a rural market opportunity of 6Bn. USD
- Setup phone order system to take 50 orders/ day
- Minimised customer acquisition cost to Rs. 8/ customer!
- Discovery of margin-volume fit for rural retail operations.
- Achieved over 25% margins at the EBIT level

member_experience_collection.title: Co-founder
member_experience_collection.description:
We are working to end poverty for small farmers by setting up farmer owned food processing units to improve and stabilise incomes of small farmers.

Activities
- Increased incomes of 1600 farmers by over 200% during lean season operations
- Advisor to companies with over 150,000 farmers towards value chain development
- Setup a tomato processing value chain for 1600 farmers in South Gujarat
- Lead teams to drive product and market fit.
- Marketed domestically produced processed tomatoes for substituting imported italian variants by manufacturing low cost high quality domestically manufactured variants.
- Setup process and product parameters for processed tomato products
- Head tomato processing operations complete with a 40 member team to drive 2MT/ day production
- Led teams to conduct market research and carry out product innovation by researching tomato seed variants and corresponding product outcomes
- Speaker at several agri focussed conferences
- Fundraised and won at several business plan competitions across several IIMs and IITs

member_experience_collection.title: Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
Strategy and Operations | Energy and Resources, Manufacturing, Real Estate.

Achievements
- Worked with teams to drive a 10 year corporate plan for a $ 100 Mn. client in the mining business in India
- Conducted a market entry for a $5 Bn. client who wanted to setup a steel business in 6 middle east countries

member_experience_collection.title: Internships
member_experience_collection.description:
Internships at banking, finance and law firms namely Axis Bank, IL&FS Financial Services, Economic Laws Practice, Volvie Capital Management.
Worked with IITK and IIFT Delhi and a few other organisations on research projects.

Achievements :
- Youngest intern at Axis Bank ever! Worked at one of their largest branches in the corporate credit department
- Setup one of the first LLPs in India at ELP
- Worked on investments in ports and liquid logistics at Volvie capital management
- Worked on debt syndication in the power space at IL&FS

member_experience_collection.title: CEO
member_experience_collection.description:
Zemaia works for businesses that want to talk to customers before closing sales and receive enquiries on their website. We enable businesses to be able to call up their website leads before they leave your website and reach out to your competitors.

A small change such as calling each and every website lead while they are still on your website will wow your customers every single time, and quicken decision making drastically. You will reduce competition by a factor of 6 times and improve your website conversion rates by 33%. An increase in 33% sales means, you will achieve in two years what you were meant to achieve in 3 from your website sales.

Its the small changes that have large effects.

Send in your contact details to arnav@zemaia.com and we will integrate with your website in 10 minutes.

Activities
- Sales : B2B sales, lead generation by cold calling, digital marketing - inbound and outbound
- Lead a team to code and design the backend and app for iOS and android stores in 2 months!

Website : www.zemaia.com
Email : arnav@zemaia.com

member_experience_collection.title: Co-Founder & CEO
member_experience_collection.description:
SyncDial - An enterprise mobility product for businesses engaged in digital marketing to use existing phones and call sales enquiries while they are still browsing the site
• Led a team of 6 developers and designers to design, build and manage the iOS and Android apps

Ruvein - A social enterprise delivering low cost goods to rural households in India. We created a phone order catalog and virtual shops
• Led a team of 8 to setup and manage end to end store and catalog operations
• Minimised B2C customer acquisition cost to lowest in the Indian retail business
• Built procurement relationships with 20+ suppliers across merchandize categories

member_experience_collection.title: Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
The Michael Page growth story in India has few parallels!

We started operations in India in 2011 with 5 consultants and two offices across Mumbai and Delhi. We have organically grown to over 120+ consultants building a very strong local track record and brand recall.

We are now the largest international search firm company India by head count for executive, senior and mid – management hiring. We are also officially the #1 Socially Engaged recruitment company based on Linkedin's surveys done over the past 3 years.

Michael Page has an office network spanning 180+ offices across 40+countries and employs over 8000+ consultants worldwide. We are listed on the London Stock Exchange and a constituent of the FTSE 250.

member_experience_collection.title: Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
Lead the go to market for the technical hiring business for Michael Page in India and the Michael Page growth story has few parallels.

We started operations in India in 2011 with 5 consultants and two offices across Mumbai and Delhi. We have organically grown 25x in 10 years to over 120+ consultants building a very strong local track record and brand recall.

We are now the largest international search firm company in India for executive, senior and mid – management hiring. PageGroup has a global network spanning operations in 180+ financial centres across 40+countries and employs over 8000+ consultants worldwide. We are listed on the London Stock Exchange and a constituent of the FTSE 250.

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation:
Arnav is amiable and well balanced in his approach to work professionally with his all clients . He is coordinated and keeps many balls in the air without losing focus of his objectives (Same like Mr. Arnab Goswami from Republic to research on topic first and then talk about). He is able to remain cool and calm. He is very approachable and easy to get along with his clients. I have very good experience with him for many fruitful discussion with best suitable result advised by him.
I would recommend him and wish him great success in his career.
I was immensely impressed with Arnav's ability to handle toughest client effortlessly. I like his negotiation and communication, which suits to his role , best

“Arnav is amiable and well balanced in his approach to work professionally with his all clients . He is coordinated and keeps many balls in the air without losing focus of his objectives (Same like Mr. Arnab Goswami from Republic to research on topic first and then talk about). I would recommend him and wish him great success in his career.”
